name: Date
description: Utilities to work with dates and times.

params.name: First time stamp
params.description: The first time stamp to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the time stamps.

params.name: Second time stamp
params.description: The second time stamp to compare.

conditions.name: Compare date strings
conditions.description: Compare two date strings. The date strings are parsed into UTC time stamps to do the comparison.

params.name: First date string
params.description: The first date string to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the date strings.

params.name: Second date string
params.description: The second date string to compare.

conditions.name: Compare part of time stamps
conditions.description: Compare a part of two time stamps.

params.name: First time stamp
params.description: The first time stamp to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the time stamps.

params.name: Second time stamp
params.description: The second time stamp to compare.

params.name: Part
params.description: The part of the time stamps to compare.

conditions.name: Compare part of date strings
conditions.description: Compare a part of two date strings.

params.name: First date string
params.description: The first date string to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the date strings.

params.name: Second date string
params.description: The second date string to compare.

params.name: Part
params.description: The part of the date strings to compare.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to compare values in local or universal time.

expressions.name: Get
expressions.description: Get a universal time stamp from the specified parts of a date.

params.name: Year
params.description: The year of the new time stamp

params.name: Month
params.description: The month of the new time stamp (0 - 11)

params.name: Day
params.description: The day of the new time stamp (1 - 31)

params.description: The hours of the new time stamp (0 - 23)

expressions.name: Now
expressions.description: Get a time stamp for the current time.

expressions.name: TimezoneOffset
expressions.description: The offset, in minutes, from the local host to universal time.

expressions.name: ToTimerHours
expressions.description: Convert milliseconds to the equivalent elapsed hours count. The result is always a whole number.

params.name: Milliseconds
params.description: The milliseconds to convert

expressions.name: ToTimerMinutes
expressions.description: Convert milliseconds to the equivalent elapsed minutes count. The result is always a whole number in the range (0 - 59).

params.name: Milliseconds
params.description: The milliseconds to convert

expressions.name: ToTimerSeconds
expressions.description: Convert milliseconds to the equivalent elapsed seconds count. The result is always a whole number in the range (0 - 59).

params.name: Milliseconds
params.description: The milliseconds to convert

expressions.name: ToTimerMilliseconds
expressions.description: Convert milliseconds to the equivalent elapsed milliseconds count. The result is always a whole number in the range (0 - 999).

params.name: Milliseconds
params.description: The milliseconds to convert

expressions.name: ToTotalHours
expressions.description: Convert milliseconds to the equivalent hours.

params.name: Milliseconds

expressions.name: ToTotalSeconds

params.name: Milliseconds
params.description: The milliseconds to convert

expressions.name: FormatDateWithStyles
expressions.description: Format a timestamp with a locale and the specified styles

params.name: Locale
params.description: The locale to use for formatting

params.name: Timestamp
params.description: The UTC timestamp to format

params.name: Date style
params.description: Optional date style can be any of 'full', 'long', 'medium' or 'short'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Time style
params.description: Optional time style can be any of 'full', 'long', 'medium' or 'short'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Hour format
params.description: Optional hour format can be '12' or '24'. An empty string will produce a locale dependant result

expressions.name: FormatDateWithComponents
expressions.description: Format a timestamp with a locale and the specified components

params.name: Locale
params.description: The locale to use for formatting

params.name: Timestamp
params.description: The UTC timestamp to format

params.name: Weekday
params.description: Optional week day format can be any of 'long', 'short' or 'narrow'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Year
params.description: Optional year format can be any of 'numeric' or '2-digit'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Month
params.description: Optional month format can be any of 'numeric', '2-digit', 'long', 'short' or 'narrow'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Day
params.description: Optional day format can be any of 'numeric' or '2-digit'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Hour
params.description: Optional hour format can be any of 'numeric' or '2-digit'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Minute
params.description: Optional minute format can be any of 'numeric' or '2-digit'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Second
params.description: Optional second format can be any of 'numeric' or '2-digit'. Ignore using an empty string

params.name: Hour format
params.description: Optional hour format can be '12' or '24'. An empty string will produce a locale dependant result

expressions.name: ExportTimestamp
expressions.description: Get the time stamp for when the project was exported from the editor.
